Description: Rim sherd of Chian pottery Type B kantharos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed (fired red and partly worn) below; top of rim glazed; exterior reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: Many kantharoi Type B (See Williams, D. ‘Aigina, Aphaia-Tempel 5. The pottery from Chios’, Archäologischer Anzeiger 1983, 169) have painted inscriptions beneath the rim and several have been found on Aegina as well as at Naukratis.
Bibliographic references: Cook & Woodhead 1952 / Painted Inscriptions on Chiot Pottery (p. 168, no. 143)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 727, no. 869)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1742) (phase 2)
